duties_responsibilities.duty: Training, coaching, and evaluating the retail team.
Managing store's inventory and overseeing the buying process.
Selecting and pricing quality, on-trend clothing from customers for the store.
Overseeing store displays and visual merchandising.
Training and overseeing register operators while maintaining accuracy.
Providing top-notch customer service and ensuring revenue and intake goals are met.
Handling special projects and other responsibilities as needed.
